mapper.sql: manid, lid, serial_no, tracking, carton_no, scccarton_count
mapper.select:
select count(1) FROM edi_man_ICT_2020 m LEFT JOIN edi_detail_ICT_2020 d ON m.lid = d.linid LEFT JOIN edi_heading_ICT_2020 h ON d.id = h.id LEFT JOIN edi_heading_update_ICT u ON h.id = u.hid LEFT JOIN edi_truck_no_ICT n ON m.manid = n.mid LEFT JOIN t_dict t ON t.val = d.st_country
order by h.actual_date desc

SELECT m.manid, h.ID AS 'hid', h.actual_date, h.shipper, h.original, h.hawb, h.awb, h.shipmentway, d.st_country, t.type, m.tracking, d.dn, d.partno, h.total_pallet, u.CTNs, u.QTY, u.factory_weight, n.truck_no FROM edi_man_ICT_2020 m LEFT JOIN edi_detail_ICT_2020 d ON m.lid = d.linid LEFT JOIN edi_heading_ICT_2020 h ON d.id = h.id LEFT JOIN edi_heading_update_ICT u ON h.id = u.hid LEFT JOIN edi_truck_no_ICT n ON m.manid = n.mid LEFT JOIN t_dict t ON t.val = d.st_country
order by h.actual_date desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT m.manid, h.ID AS 'hid', h.actual_date, h.shipper, h.original, h.hawb, h.awb, h.shipmentway, d.st_country, t.type, m.tracking, d.dn, d.partno, h.total_pallet, u.CTNs, u.QTY, u.factory_weight, n.truck_no FROM edi_man_ICT_2020 m LEFT JOIN edi_detail_ICT_2020 d ON m.lid = d.linid LEFT JOIN edi_heading_ICT_2020 h ON d.id = h.id LEFT JOIN edi_heading_update_ICT u ON h.id = u.hid LEFT JOIN edi_truck_no_ICT n ON m.manid = n.mid LEFT JOIN t_dict t ON t.val = d.st_country
order by h.actual_date desc

SELECT m.manid, h.ID AS 'hid', h.actual_date, h.shipper, h.original, h.hawb, h.awb, h.shipmentway, d.st_country, t.type, m.tracking, d.dn, d.partno, h.total_pallet, u.CTNs, u.QTY, u.factory_weight, n.truck_no FROM edi_man_ICT_2020 m LEFT JOIN edi_detail_ICT_2020 d ON m.lid = d.linid LEFT JOIN edi_heading_ICT_2020 h ON d.id = h.id LEFT JOIN edi_heading_update_ICT u ON h.id = u.hid LEFT JOIN edi_truck_no_ICT n ON m.manid = n.mid LEFT JOIN t_dict t ON t.val = d.st_country where m.manid in
#{item}
mapper.insert:
insert into edi_man_ICT_2020
manid,
lid,
serial_no,
tracking,
carton_no,
scccarton_count,
#{manid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tracking,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cartonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scccartonCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update edi_man_ICT_2020
lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tracking = #{tracking,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carton_no = #{cartonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scccarton_count = #{scccartonCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where manid = #{manid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update edi_man_ICT_2020 set lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tracking = #{tracking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carton_no = #{cartonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scccarton_count = #{scccartonCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where manid = #{manid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
